title: Interpretation of a dream about saving money for children

preview.html: The dreamer also has an important role in determining the interpretation of the dream, because a man’s vision differs from a woman’s vision, which we will present in detail in our article, so follow us. Interpretation of a dream about providing money to children: The vision of giving money to children is considered a good vision that bodes well for its owner. Seeing yourself giving money to children represents liberation. Of worries and sorrows. The girl who sees in her dream that she is giving money, but in the form of coins. They show the anxiety that this girl suffers from. The woman who sees that she is giving money is an expression of the goodness that she will receive in her life. Giving money by someone is An expression of the good that the dreamer will receive. When a woman gives money to children, it is an expression of the money that she will receive. That woman in the near future, God willing. Whoever sees in his dream that he is giving money to children. It is evidence that many positive changes will happen to him. . This will make his life better. A person who sees in his dream that he is giving money to children and has a financial problem. It is evidence that his need will be eliminated and his financial situation will improve. A person who sees in a dream that he is giving money to children and is suffering from what he is. This is evidence that we will get rid of this Worrying soon, God willing. Whoever works in trade and dreams of giving money to children. It is evidence that he will make a lot of profits from the trade he is working on. Interpretation of the dream of giving money by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin says: Whoever thinks that he is giving paper money. Evidence that he will get A lot of money in the next few days. A person who sees money in the form of banknotes in his dream is a person engaged in trade. It is evidence that he will make a large profit from his work. Seeing paper money can also indicate the end of the problems that the dreamer is suffering from. It will be Happy in his next life. A dream in which a person is seen giving money to the dreamer. An expression that the dreamer wants to complain about his sorrows to someone, and God knows best. See also: Interpretation of dreams about collecting coins from dirt. Interpretation of a dream about saving money in a dream for a single woman. An unmarried woman who dreams that someone gives her coins. Metal. It is evidence that this girl will go through a lot of trouble in the future, and God knows best. When a girl sees in her dream that there is a dead man who gave her money. This is evidence that things will go well in the coming days, God willing. Interpretation of the dream of giving money For the needy. Whoever sees in a dream that he is giving money to the poor. Evidence that the dreamer does many good deeds with the intention of doing good. Whoever sees in his dream that he is giving money is evidence of relief after distress. This vision can also mean the patient’s recovery after any illness. And that his life will improve. The dreamer is in a good condition, God willing. Interpretation of a dream about giving money to a known person. Whoever sees in his dream that he is giving money to someone he knows. Evidence that the dreamer wants the other person to be his partner in his various successful projects. This vision could be an expression of the dreamer’s desire. In providing all advice to this person if this person needs it

title: Interpretation of a dream about the upper part of a tooth falling out for a married woman

preview.html: Therefore, the Dream Interpreter website would like to interpret the dream of the upper teeth falling out for both married and single people, pregnant women and men, and here are all the interpretations and signals, so follow the lines below with us.Interpretation of the upper part falling out by Ibn SirinIbn Sirin interpreted seeing the upper part of the teeth falling out as good news for the dreamer of nutrition And money soon. And if the dreamer sees in a dream the upper part of the tooth falling to the ground. The vision is evidence of the death of a person dear and dear to the dreamer. And if a married woman sees in her dream the upper part of the tooth falling out in her room and on her bed, and she plans to become pregnant. Eyesight is like skin with a narrow pregnancy. Seeing the dreamer’s upper teeth falling out one after the other is evidence of his long life, and also an indication that he will be in good health. And if a man sees in a dream that his upper teeth are falling out of his hand. This vision indicates many problems, fears, troubles, and obstacles. Interpretation of the part falling out. Al-Alawi to Ibn Shaheen. Ibn Shaheen explained that seeing the lower tooth falling out in the dreamer’s hand. It is mentioned that he is suffering from the financial losses that he is suffering from. In the case of the dreamer, he saw the lower tooth falling out in his hand. The dream shows a lot of money coming to the dreamer, but the money is forbidden. And if the merchant sees in a dream falling A lower tooth, this indicates that he is suffering from financial losses. But if you see the merchant sleeping in the fall of his final year. The vision shows the abundance of food that comes to him from his trade. If a man sees in a dream that he is pulling his upper molar while performing his work, then the vision indicates the loss of His job. However, if one of the witnesses has his tooth extracted by the specialist doctor, the vision shows his ability to make many correct decisions. If a married woman sees in a dream that she is removing her tooth, then the dream indicates the presence of marital disputes. See also: Interpretation of a dream about cleaning teeth for a single woman. Interpretation of a tooth falling out. The upper part of Imam Nabulsi’s tooth. Imam Nabulsi says if the dreamer sees in a dream that he is clenching his teeth. The dream indicates that the dreamer is spending his money on prohibited things. In the case of a vision in which one of his upper teeth is removed with a feeling of pain, and indeed the dreamer is suffering from worries, then the vision indicates death. Worries. Seeing the dreamer’s teeth falling out and losing them is evidence of the imminent death of the pioneer. But if the dreamer sees that he is holding his teeth after they fall out, then the dream shows the good that will come to him soon. If the dreamer sees in a dream his decayed teeth falling out, then the dream indicates the collapse of the problems that he is going through However, if his teeth were crooked, the dream indicates the presence of problems and disagreements among his family. Interpretation of a dream about the upper part of a tooth falling out for a single woman: Dream interpreters say if an unmarried girl sees in a dream the upper part of the tooth falling out and she is sad about it. The vision indicates salvation from problems. And the worries that you face. In the case where the girl saw the upper part of the tooth falling out and felt severe pain in the place where the tooth fell out. This vision shows the presence of haters in her life. If an unmarried girl sees the upper part of the tooth falling out

title: Interpretation of a dream about bread and seeing flour, dough, and cakes in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about baking breadInterpretation of a dream about dough for a married womanInterpretation of a dream about dough for a single womanInterpretation of a dream about dough in the handRolling dough in a dreamInterpretation of a dream about raw doughSymbol of yeast in a dreamDough in a dream Fahd Al-OsaimiAl-Kirmani said that the vision of eating warm bread indicates a good life. Whoever sees that he is eating bread interprets the king’s justice and his justice for the herd. As for the bays, they are hard-earned money, but they are few and useful. Ismail bin Al-Ash’ath said: “It interprets bread among the ranks of the people, so the vision of the loaf of the king is a city, the president has a mandate, the merchant and the rich are a thousand dirhams, and the subscriber.” People give a hundred dirhams, without it, a dirham is ten, and an adulterated loaf is not praiseworthy, and many loaves of bread mean a lot of money for brothers and friends and a long life. As for hazelnuts, they are interpreted as preserved food, and they may indicate travel for those who want them, and the drier the better. As for bread, whoever sees that he finds a loaf or Two loaves or half a loaf, announcing the end of gloom. Daniel said that flour is interpreted as lawful money without hardship, barley flour is valid in religion, and millet flour is money with hardship, and they are among the most miserable people. As for straw, it is great wealth, goodness, grace, and blessing. And achieving the state’s request and victory, even if it was during the sowing days, it would be more beneficial, and the wheat straw would be more beneficial. Rich with information. As for the dough, if it is made of barley flour, then it is kindness and payment of the donut debt, and if it is made of wheat flour, then it takes money from trade, and will be of great benefit. . If it is fermented. If it is unfermented and not fermented, then it is not good, and if it is sour, it spoils with loss, and the yeast may indicate a trip to relatives. As for the tablet, if it is fat, it is rich in blessings, and its softness is better than dry, and the abundance of needs in it is better as a whole, and one tablet. It is generated in parts and scattered, sustenance for a group because it is the pillar of religion and the life of souls, and thus enables man to search for sustenance and obey God Almighty, and perhaps it is an indication of knowledge and Islam, and perhaps this is something that does not support human life and it is. It deserves praise in everything, especially for the one who ate it. As for cake, the money is little, and perhaps it is a goodness and a blessing, and if he does not eat it, he keeps his money. Jaber Al-Maghribi said: Whoever sees himself eating thin bread, it is interpreted as living a good life, and perhaps it indicates a short life. As for bran, it is interpreted as want, dryness, want, and difficulty in life, especially for those who had it and ate it, and some of them hated seeing it as a whole in any way. Abu Saeed Al-Wazir said that wheat flour is an honorable currency in trade and from it you can reap many profits. Abu Saeed Al-Da’iah said: A dream about straw means a lot of money, and it was narrated that Al-Mansur, may God have mercy on him, saw in Basra as if he was riding on a donkey, and under. It was a load of hay on top of the lamb, and it crossed the bridge after hitting the donkey so hard that it passed. The world and the story are big and it was as it passed. And whoever sees it entering an adopted child and knows that it is his property, it is interpreted as wealth and the fulfillment of the desires of this world and the afterlife. Some passers-by said that I love seeing hay, as I have not seen it except that I have money in any form.

Abu Saeed Al-Da’iah said: A dream about straw means a lot of money, and it was narrated that Al-Mansur, may God have mercy on him, saw in Basra as if he was riding on a donkey, and under. title: Interpretation of the name Ibrahim in a dream and seeing a person named Ibrahim

preview.html: The name Ibrahim in a dream symbolizes salvation from worries and anxiety. Dreaming about someone named Ibrahim may indicate successful partnerships with this person. Hearing the name Ibrahim in a dream is evidence of happiness and joy in the dreamer’s life. It works, and God knows best. The meaning of the name Ibrahim in a dream. The name Ibrahim in a dream indicates the acquisition of wisdom and many good things in general. It can be an indication of the fulfillment of desires and desires for marriage and engagement if the dreamer is single, and it can indicate Hajj if the vision is in the months of Ihram. Seeing a famous person named Ibrahim in a dream means that you will contact him for the sake of justice and entering into profitable projects and ventures, and it may mean that the dreamer will receive help from this person. Dreaming of hearing the name Ibrahim indicates good news and almost comfort, and whoever sees in his dream a boy named Ibrahim, this is evidence For the general good and overwhelming happiness in the life of the dreamer, and God is always All-Knowing. Interpretation of seeing the name Abraham in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin explained the name Abraham in a dream with strength and victory over enemies. Dreaming of the name Abraham can indicate abandonment of sins, repentance from sins, and peace that prevails in the life of the dreamer, and the name Abraham. In the Qur’an, in a dream it indicates good tidings of salvation from worries and worries. Whoever sees a person named Ibrahim in a dream will gain wisdom and useful advice. Writing Ibrahim’s name in a dream means deliverance from evil and evil, and whoever sees himself writing Ibrahim’s name in beautiful handwriting in a dream will achieve his goals by doing good. Seeing Ibrahim’s name written in a dream indicates deliverance from evil and the deception of enemies. . A dream about being called by the name of Abraham indicates seeking help from an experienced and wise person. Whoever sees someone calling him by the name of Abraham in a dream will gain a high status and honor among his people, and seeing the name changed to Abraham in a dream means enjoining good and forbidding evil. This is what dream interpretation scholars say: saying the name of Abraham in a dream It means that you tell the truth and deal honestly with others. Whoever sees that he is calling the name of Ibrahim in a dream, he is asking for help from the leader of the people to obtain his rights, and the name Ibrahim being said in a dream to a sick person is good news for recovery and recovery. With health and well-being, and God knows best. Hearing the name of Abraham in a dream. Dreaming of hearing the name of Abraham indicates the proximity of rest and relief from fatigue and anxiety. Seeing hearing the name of Abraham loudly in a dream means hearing him being reprimanded for an act of disobedience, and hearing the name of Abraham in a beautiful voice in a dream is evidence of hearing the good news of one’s fathers. And children. A dream of fear when hearing the name Ibrahim indicates that the boy is separated on a journey, and whoever sees that he runs when he hears the name Ibrahim in his sleep, abandons family responsibilities and does not carry out his duties. The dream of hearing the name Ibrahim from the recitation of the Qur’an indicates that the dreamer will attain guidance and justice. To see and hear a person named Ibrahim speaking in a dream means a happy event in the dreamer’s life, and whoever sees that he hears a person named Ibrahim crying in a dream, this is evidence of the improvement of his conditions and circumstances. After the difficulties I faced, and God is Most High

title: Interpretation of seeing sodomy in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing sodomy in a dream in different situations. Sodomy is one of the things that God Almighty has forbidden, forbidden, and warned against, and God Almighty punished Lot’s family because of this matter, for which His throne was merciful, so he was disturbed, but what? About seeing sodomy in a dream, which one can see. It caused him great and severe distress, and seeing sodomy has many meanings and different meanings that we will learn about through this encyclopedia article. Interpretation of sodomy in a dream according to Imam Nabulsi: Imam Nabulsi says that if a person dreams that he is practicing sodomy, this means that the dreamer is suffering from stress and tension because he cannot achieve What it aims to achieve. The dreamer commits a sin and there are those who encourage him to do it. But if a person sees in his dream that he is marrying a person whom he does not know, this means that he will be defeated by his enemy, but if he does not know that person, he will obtain money from behind and benefit greatly from it. This person, but if he sees that she is marrying a man in a position, this indicates a high position and promotion at work. But if he sees that he is practicing sodomy with the governor, this vision shows a great loss of power and money, but if he is with a female director at work, this indicates The good relationship between him and his manager at work, but if a person saw in a dream that he was practicing sodomy with another, his close friends or brothers showed that they were worried and angry and that there was a major dispute between them. Interpretation of seeing sodomy in a dream by Ibn Sirin: Ibn Sirin says that if a person dreams that he He commits sodomy with a young child. This vision is not good, as it indicates that the dreamer will lose a lot of money and take people’s money unlawfully. He has earned a lot of money and this vision bodes well for the young man. But if one sees in his dream that he is sodomizing a slave, it means that he will ease his affairs and his situation will change for the better. However, if a person sees in his dream that he is marrying someone without ejaculation, this indicates his inability to achieve what he wants. But if a man sees in a dream that he is practicing sodomy with someone during ejaculation, this indicates that a lot of good will be achieved behind this person. To interpret a different dream, you can use the Live Dream Interpretation app.

title: Help in a dream: Interpretation of asking for help, offering it, or rejecting it in a dream

preview.html: Dear friends, welcome to the dream interpretation website. The topic of this article is about the interpretation of help in a dream and the meanings and symbols associated with this dream.Help in a dream can take multiple or different forms, including material help, including moral help. The dreamer may see himself as offering help to another person and may also see that someone is offering him help. Characters that we know and others may appear in the scene of this dream. Each has its own meaning and therefore requires interpretation. This dream comes from different angles, the first of which is the nature and form of assistance (material, moral), and secondly, was the dreamer asking for help or providing it? Is the person who appeared with the dreamer known or unknown? Was he a man, a young man, or a woman? All of these factors and others may intervene in the dream to give us a meaning or a vision that reveals the meanings of the dream and its encrypted messages. Many questions may arise from this article, but of course we will touch on the most important of them. We wish you a good and useful workday, God willing. Help in a dream: General interpretationThe subconscious or subconscious mind can put us in difficult situations, so the dream depicts us as if we are in a difficult situation or problem that requires the intervention and assistance of others. Sometimes this person is the father and other times it is the mother, brother, etc. In our dreams, we strangers do not know and they may intervene in the scene to help us. The reason for asking for help or needing it in a dream must face a dilemma or problem that is difficult to solve in waking life, such as psychological, emotional, social, health, and financial crises. Sometimes the dreamer sees as if he is surrounded by fire from all sides He panics. He tries in vain to get out of the place surrounded by fire. Suddenly someone appears and quickly intervenes to break the viewer. Help in such situations (fire, drowning, fall) indicates the presence of people around them, whom the viewer trusts or feels safe in front of, but at the same time feels afraid of losing them or has a constant need for their presence. Help and rescue in such dreams have positive connotations. Among them are quick reassuring messages from the subconscious stating that there is a safe space around us despite difficulties or painful situations. Asking for help in a dream When you see in your dream that you are asking for help from someone in a dream, you necessarily need more attention and care from this person. Know the type of change or your odds of success as a result. Someone refuses to help you in a dream. You may need some money in a dream or in a dream you go to a specific person and ask him to host you because you have not found a place to live, but you are surprised that this person refuses to help you or completely ignores you on Although there is a good relationship between you two. This type of dream is based on a lack of trust and security towards people or the future. Your subconscious mind puts you in the worst unexpected possibilities to push you to be more careful and serious, as if it is telling you: Do not be safe from days or eternity because some of its characteristics are betrayal and camouflage. Some of it is interpreted

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a family member betraying you in a dream

preview.html: Betrayal is one of the worst feelings a lover can experience, because it represents a wound to dignity and pride, weakens self-confidence, and can end the relationship. It has to do with reality, as some believe, and this is what I will explain to you. Interpretation of a dream about a mouse in a dream for an unmarried woman - the symbol of a mouse in a dream. Interpretation of betrayal of a lover in a dream for a single woman. Ibn Sirin believes that betrayal of a lover in a girl’s dream may portend the girl’s loyalty and loyalty to her lover and that he may He will marry her in the near future. Some psychologists believe that seeing a lover betraying her could be a vision that stems from the intense love within this girl for her lover and her fear of losing him. Also, the girl who was betrayed in the dream indicates this girl’s excellence in her studies and her obtaining distinguished grades in her studies. This year. Some commentators believe that the betrayal of an unmarried lover could be a warning sign for this girl about the bad way she treats her lover. Interpretation of a dream about wrestling in a dream. Betrayal in a dream for a single woman. Al-Nabulsi says that an unmarried girl who has been betrayed by her friends could be a sign of This girl will suffer from poverty and suffering for a long time. Seeing betrayal in a dream of an unmarried girl means that the dreamer will suffer from worries and sorrows that will continue for a period. Seeing betrayal in a dream by some of her colleagues may indicate that this girl has left her current job, lost her strength, or Her position. However, if a single girl deceives herself in a dream, this indicates that girl’s bad morals and her bad intentions towards others. Interpretation of seeing a dragon in a dream by Ibn Sirin - The symbol of seeing a dragon in a dream. Interpretation of a dream of betrayal by her lover in a man’s dream. Ibn Sirin says: If a man betrays himself This may indicate the stability of the family situation between him and the husband. Cheating in a man’s dream could indicate the imminent appearance of pregnancy in the wife, which may increase the love for the wife in the man’s heart. As for a man who was betrayed by a friend, this may indicate that this man will fall In difficult problems and crises. Interpretation of a dream about the desert in a dream. Interpretation of betrayal in a dream for a single woman. Imam Al-Sadiq says that seeing the preacher betray the dreamer may mean that this girl will fall into major financial problems in the coming days. But if the girl is the one who betrays the lover in the dream, That girl is committing immoral acts, sins, and disobedience, and she must repent to God Almighty. However, some commentators confirm that seeing a girl’s betrayal is one of the indications of strengthening the bond between her and her lover through the formal connection between them. Interpretation of a dream about sea waves in a dream. Interpretation of seeing betrayal in a dream For a woman: Interpretation of a dream about a storm in a dream. A large group of dream interpreters believe that seeing her husband’s betrayal in a dream indicates a major positive change in this woman’s life and may indicate trips with her husband abroad. If the dreamer is pregnant, then seeing her lover’s betrayal of her is one of the signs that This portends that a woman will easily give birth. Many married women see that

title: The dream of eating cake in a dream for a married, pregnant and unmarried woman

preview.html: I like itFansSubscribedFans The dream of eating cake in a dream For married, pregnant and single women, cake is considered one of the most desirable dreams for many people, because some visions confirm that pastries of all kinds are a symbol of stress, tension and unpleasant events. But experts differed in their interpretation of this point, because some indicate that this dream may be the cause of the happy events that the dreamer is experiencing. Interpretation of eating cake in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of food: Cake in a dream can be evidence of kindness and abundant food that the dreamer receives. In general, cakes in a dream mean blessing. In livelihood. As for eating cake in a dream with sugar, it is a sign of goodness and abundance of food. Eating cake and feeling happy about it is a sign of the beginning of a new love relationship. Interpretation of eating cake in a dream for a single woman. An unmarried woman ate cake in a dream. It is a sign of marriage soon. If she sees herself eating large quantities of Large cakes, this indicates that the date of marriage is approaching, with someone with whom she will be very happy and satisfied. Cakes in an unmarried girl’s dream also indicate the achievement of goals, dreams and desires or evidence of achieving goals. Interpretation of eating cake in a dream for a married womanIf a married woman sees that she She does not want to eat cakes, as this indicates that she will face problems and financial crises. Seeing cakes in a dream indicates a trip in the near future. Seeing white cakes in a dream from a married woman is a sign of the end of problems and the elimination of bad events. Interpretation of a dream about cakes in a dream for a man: vision A man in a dream eating a cake is a sign of many problems and exposure to many financial crises. It indicates the man’s reluctance to eat how in a dream, this indicates his inability to act. A dream of wedding cakes in a dream indicates wealth and good luck. A dream of cakes and cakes in a dream indicates To the life and happiness that the dreamer will have. Dreaming about date cookies is evidence of earning a living and getting a lot of money. Eating sugar cookies indicates good news. What happens in the dream indicates responding to the request he is making. Add the dream you want Explain it with reference to the family situation in a comment below the article, and we will respond to it and clarify it.

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a facial mask in a dream - seeing a facial mask in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a face mask in a dream: If you see that you are wearing a mask, this portends temporary problems, because a loved one will misunderstand you, but you will benefit from this temporary aversion. If you dream that others are wearing masks, this portends your struggle with lies and envy. If you dream of a mask, this indicates that there is someone who is unfaithful to you and that your affairs will fail. If a girl dreams that she is wearing a mask, this foretells that she will be able to control a loved one. If she dreams that she takes off her mask or sees others doing so, this portends that she will fail to impress her loved ones. She should prepare her behavior in the wake of this dream. If you see in the body that you are wearing a mask, this foretells that you will deceive your friends and convey misleading and misleading ideas to them. Moments website in a graded interpretation of dreams. Interpretation of a dream about Ibn Sirin’s face. Seeing a beautiful face in a dream, as Ibn Sirin interpreted it, indicates the high status of the dreamer. As for seeing an ugly face In a dream, it is evidence of an inappropriate status among people. Seeing facial hair in strange places indicates worries and sorrow. As for seeing facial deformity in a dream, it indicates the arrival of problems and difficulties for the dreamer. Interpretation of a dream about a beautiful face: Seeing a beautiful face in a dream indicates good luck and happiness. For the dreamer. Also, seeing a beautiful face in a dream is good news about money, success, or travel. Seeing the face of a female camel indicates the world and the happiness and goodness in it for the pioneer. Seeing the faces of children in a dream indicates happiness and pleasure. Seeing the beautiful face of the deceased in a dream It is good news about a happy ending. Just as a beautiful face in a dream indicates parental approval. Seeing a beautiful face in a dream symbolizes the scope of the dreamer’s pursuit of goodness in religion and in this world. Interpretation of a dream about an ugly face: Seeing an ugly face in a dream is an unpleasant vision. Seeing The dreamer, as if his face is ugly, is a warning of bad consequences, and he must beware of his actions and deeds. Seeing children with ugly faces indicates the coming of sorrows and bad news. Seeing an ugly face in a dream shows the world, its worries, fatigue, and difficulties. Interpretation of a dream about a brown face. Seeing a brown face in a man’s dream indicates Fame and power. As for seeing a black face in a dream, this indicates the mistakes of the owner of that face. Also, seeing a brown face in a dream is good news about the arrival of sustenance and kindness to the dreamer. Interpretation of a dream about facial wrinkles: Seeing wrinkles on the face in a dream is a good dream for the dreamer, as it indicates Years of misery, effort, and patience. Seeing wrinkles on the face in a man’s dream means that he will get a lot of money. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a face mask in a dream: Seeing a woman’s wrinkles in a dream is good news for her.

title: What is the interpretation of seeing yourself completely pulling ear hair in a dream?

preview.html: Trend website gives you a complete explanation of seeing ear hair moving in a dream. The ear is one of the important organs in the human body, as the sense of hearing is one of the five senses that originated in humans. Parts of the inner, middle and outer ear. Seeing yourself pulling ear hair in a dream may be a disturbing dream. It is normal for a person to see in a complete dream a strange and unrealistic dream that leads to anxiety and psychological discomfort. Here, dear followers, what is the interpretation of seeing hair collected in a complete dream for the family, married couples, pregnant women, and men. I saw myself pulling ear hair in a dream. Full ears of hair in a dream represent gossip, gossip, and people’s words that the dreamer hears from the people around him. If a person dreams that he is pulling hair from his ears and eating them. This indicates that he has committed immoral acts and sins. Whoever sees that he has thick hair in his ear, he has learned a lot of science, or he is fickle. Seeing hair that has been completely removed from the ear in a dream can express the dreamer’s repentance and remove the mistakes he has committed. Also , A dream about hair coming out of the ear indicates choosing praise and kind and gentle words. What is Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing hair coming out of the ear in a dream? Seeing yourself pulling hair from the ears in a dream could be a warning against listening to the opinion of the forbidden and those who displease God and must To stop and retreat. Likewise, when the dreamer sees a lot of thick hair coming out completely in the dream, it represents many and accumulated debts. Interpretation of seeing pebbles entering the dreamer’s ear for the one who has a vision, and hearing harmful words that harm him and evil him. Seeing hair coming out of the ear of the ruler or leader in The dream is completely considered to be that the dreamer is a spy for that leader. Likewise, if a married woman sees that the hair on her ears is thick, this indicates an abundance of food and a large number of offspring for her. What is the interpretation of seeing a woman pulling the hair from her ear? When a woman sees gum coming out of her ear and playing with it, this is a sign. However, the girl is lazy in performing duties and acts of obedience. Just as something constantly comes out of the ear and a foul odor comes out of it, this means that she is not responding to God’s commands. If a girl sees in her dream that she is cleaning her ears from her hair, this means that she will get married and prepare her for a life of obedience. The interpretation Seeing all hair in a dream in relation to a woman’s bowl indicates that she is disobeying God, harming herself, and approaching immorality and disobedience. What is the interpretation of a married woman plucking her hair? Plucking a married woman’s hair in a dream is a sign of the death of distress, harm, and sadness, and the hardships she suffers from will go away. Likewise, if a girl sees that she is cutting the long, thick hair of her ears, this is a sign that she will give birth. Cleaning a married woman’s ears in her dream means that she will live a happy and joyful life with her husband. Cutting the hair of the entire ears in a dream Seeing ear hair in a dream is full of visions of happy occasions and hearing good news. Also, seeing hair cut in general in dreams indicates a new life and the dreamer’s transition to a higher status. Likewise, seeing your hair in an ear
